marklogic.body: A true travesty of justice. Zimmerman was known as a man who would call 911 repeatedly on minor things, and he was a noted racist. This murder screams "racially motivated". As a watch Captain, even as a "regular" citizen, he had no duty to , other than to either protect himself, or a third party. And ONLY if the situation warranted deadly force. This kid, armed with nothing more dealy than a bag of Skittles, is the true victim. While I can see that making an arrest on the Spot could be put (a premature arrest could have clouded or even defeated any chance of a later prosecution), the overall investigation should be over with swiftly. The so-called "Stand Your Ground" Law, was put in place as a protection from the inevitable civil litigation that would follow if a true victim was faced with a deadly force situation. IT DOES NOT PROMOTE VIGILANTE JUSTICE. IT DOES NOT GIVE YOU AUTHORITY TO ACT. Zimmerman, Florida has a death penalty. May God have mercy on your soul.
